# nprbooksR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a data package that contains data from the past years of the [NPR book concierge](https://apps.npr.org/best-books/#view=covers&year=2020) from 2013 - 2020. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of nprbooksR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("nprbooksR")
```
